full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DMIGS BRTZE MA LA BRTEN GSUM TZONG KHA PA BYABS KHRUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES BUM MCHOG 'DI NI SNYIGS MA'I 'DUS 'DIR RGYAL PO DENG BCAS SOGS SDE BRGYAD DRANG SRONG 'BYUNG PO RNAMS KYANG 'TSE BA'I @009A *, ,'GRO BA MANG PO LA KHRID DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS MCHOD PA SHIS DAR PI LEG THU SHES RAB BZANG PO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, DPAL MGON BSHAD DOR MING CAN GYIS LCAGS DBYAR THA MA'I ZLAS TSES BCU BDUN LA TSE CHOG THUM BZHES PA'I SA CHANG SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBU MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD KYIS DGYES SO, ,)
